speaker: mon_mi_go_fleshwarper
mon_mi_go_nethermancer
//: This and below represent the mi-go parroting incantations they've heard from captured human (and elven, dwarven, etc) wizards, not them casting spells using them.

sound.//~: The mi-go is parroting a Latin incantation here that should not be translated.
sound.str: "Per Adonai Elohim, Adonai Jehova, Adonai Sabaoth…"

sound.//~: The mi-go is parroting a Latin incantation here that should not be translated.
sound.str: "Metraton on agla mathon, verbum pythonicum, mysterium salamandrae…"

sound.//~: The mi-go is parroting a Latin incantation here that should not be translated.
sound.str: "Conventus sylvorum, antra gnomorum, daemonia coeli gad…"

sound.//~: The mi-go is parroting a Latin incantation here that should not be translated.
sound.str: "Almousin, gibor, jehosua, evam, zariatnatmik, veni, veni, veni…"

sound.//~: The mi-go is parroting an incantation here that should not be translated.
The mi-go is parroting an incantation here that should not be translated.
